modName: Vilja In Skyrim - Face Overhaul - DELETED
summary: A simple mod that changes Vilja's appearance.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425/?][/url][img]https://i.imgur.com/lfi7PCs.png[/img]


[font=Tahoma][b][color=#76a5af][size=4]+DESCRIPTION[b]+[/b][/size][/color][/b]
[/font][font=Georgia][size=1][color=#d9ead3]This mod changes the appearance of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26393/?][b]Vilja in Skyrim[/b][/url].
I wanted to give Vilja a unique face, the way I see her, while trying to stay as true as possible to her original look.
It's standalone, you don't need any other mod to make it work, other than VILJA, of course.
As of version 1.1, [b]all [/b]body meshes are completely [color=#6aa84f][b]SFW [/b][/color]and come with a nice, blue underwear retexture.
Needless to say, do not even think to use this in conjunction with other mods that change Vilja's face.
I recommend installing this after you've met Vilja and made sure everything works ok in your game (wardrobes, ect), as suggested on Vilja's FAQ page . [/color]
[/size][/font]
[quote][font=Courier New][color=#cccccc][size=1][i]If you are using Vilja in Solstheim add-on or any of Vilja's alternate looks that requires a patch .esp,you should not activate the patch along with Vilja. You need to meet up with Vilja in Bannered Mare, go through the very first part of her quest until you can access her inventory via dialogue. Save and exit game, then enable the esp patch(es).[/i][/size][/color][/font][/quote]

[size=5]*[/size]

[b][u][color=#cc0000][size=2]UPDATE 1.2
[/size][/color][/u][/b]New face sculpt and textures
New hairstyle 
CBBE and UNP only

*

[b][color=#8e7cc3][size=3]UPDATE 1.3[/size][/color][/b]
Currently, there's an updated version of Vilja (UNP only) on my [url=http://ellasworkshop.tumblr.com/post/162630509601/vilja-13-update-for-vilja-in-skyrim-overhaul]blog[/url].





[font=Tahoma][color=#76a5af][size=4][b]+INSTALL[/b][b]+[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[font=Georgia][color=#d9ead3][size=1]Choose only one main file: CBBE , UNP .[/size][/color]
[color=#d9ead3]Download with your favourite mod manager and activate.
I recommend using Mod Organizer for keeping the Data folder clean .
I don't recommend manual installation, but if you wish, download and copy/paste the entire mod into your data folder.
Always load ViljaOverhaul AFTER the main mod and [i][b][u]AFTER [/u][/b][/i]you've met Vilja and went through the first part of her quest[/color][/font][color=#d9ead3][size=1].[/size]
[/color][b]

[font=Tahoma][color=#e06666][size=2]My other Mods:[/size][/color][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84127/?]Aurlyn and Serenity Hd Heads Replacer
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84443?]Virelda - Replacer[/url]


[size=3][/size][color=#fff2cc][size=3]About SSE Version: 
[/size][/color][b][color=#efefef]I am happy with Classic Skyrim and do not intend to port any of my mods for the time being. 

[size=5]- MOD IS COMPLETE, DO NOT EXPECT ANY UPDATE -[/size][/color][/b]
[size=5]*[/size]

[font=Tahoma][color=#76a5af][size=3]+INSTALL YOUR OWN BODY PRESET[/size][/color][/font][/b][font=Tahoma][color=#76a5af][b][size=3]+[/size]
[/b][/color]
[/font][size=1][font=Georgia][color=#d9ead3]If you use a custom bodyslide preset and want to make Vilja use it as well, here's how to do it:

- If your preset is based on th CBBE (or UNP) body, install the CBBE (or UNP) body main file first

- Copy the body meshes which you want to use from the folder meshes\actors\character\character assets

femalebody_0
femalebody_1
femalehands_0
femalehands_1
femalefeet_0
femalefeet_1


- Paste all the files in this folder meshes\viljaoverhaul\viljabody and overwrite[/color][/font][color=#d9ead3]


[/color][/size]

[size=3][img]https://i.imgur.com/jBHg74K.jpg[/img][/size]
